website_summaries.verdict: Inexpensive style of golf shoe that will yield a good level of support.
pros: Will last longer than you'd think for a golf shoe at this price range
Rubber sole provides a bit more comfort than a stiffer sole
Low profile cleats have a nice grip to them, but they are removable, making them easy to change out as needed
cons: Cushioning in the sole is too thin

customer_reviews.title: Sub Par Golf Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Anything Puma, I always buy a half size larger. This is a good looking shoe and fits appropriately due to my adjustment versus other popular golf shoes (Addidas, FootJoy, etc.). My major complaint is that the leather is already cracking after three rounds of golf, all in good Florida weather. Not good quality at all.
customer_reviews.author: Junius Hill

customer_reviews.title: Surprise Inside!!
customer_reviews.text: Great golf shoes at a Great price. Two very nice surprises in the shoes!!! 1) Two pair of shoe laces "excellent" and 2) A set of hard papered "shoe trees", very unexpected!!! They look good on me and that is really the whole point of buying golf shoes. All in all, I will buy PUMA bra
customer_reviews.author: Lewis J.

customer_reviews.title: Well made, nice fit and very comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: When I had purchased these, my biggest fear was the fit. I made sure to get a 1/2 size larger, because of the way the shoe is made and it was an excellent choice. They wear exceptionally well and have truly a firm grip to the ground, even in sand, so that I don't slip and slide. Even walking on pavement isn't jarring to the body! Well Made Puma!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dana Weber

customer_reviews.title: get a half size bigger
customer_reviews.text: Fit as described. I wear a size 11 and as mentioned they fit small so I gotan 11 1/2 and very happy. Still breaking in but so far fit amd feel good.
customer_reviews.author: matt b

customer_reviews.title: Very nice shoe, great grip
customer_reviews.text: Very nice shoe, great grip. It was very comfortable at first but at the end of 18 holes, it was hurting my toes a bit. They seem to get a little narrow at the toe and just bothered my toes. The rest of the shoe was perfect fit and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: jp4

customer_reviews.title: Great looking, Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Great looking, Comfortable, water proof and a nice sturdy golf shoe. Didn't give 5 stars because cleaning dirt out of the cleats is a pain.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: I really liked these shoes the first time I used them
customer_reviews.text: I really liked these shoes the first time I used them. I sprayed mine with camp dry so the moisture wouldn't leak in. They fit will..now if I could work on my slice..
customer_reviews.author: G. Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Perfect golf shoe for the price..
customer_reviews.text: Perfect golf shoe for the price. Comfortable, durable, and grip well. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler C.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, good quality product. I may purchase another pair.
customer_reviews.author: kp

customer_reviews.title: Do what I figured they would
customer_reviews.text: Good shoe. Played a round the day I got them. Performed as a gold shoe should as I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Joe & Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A great golf shoe. Fits perfect. Looks great and easy to clean. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: alfred wheeler

customer_reviews.title: Totally Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Product is as advertised. Excellent customer service and fast delivery! A++
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: Not comfortable. Need more cushion
customer_reviews.text: Not comfortable. Need more cushion. I could feel spikes through the soul. I returned them. Disappointed with cost of return. 20.00 to mail and restocking charge. I will not buy your products in future. Steve 804 784 8799
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Louisiana Rick
customer_reviews.text: Fit a little loose. Not as comfortable as others I have owned. About average.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Amazing shoes, very nice
customer_reviews.text: I really like these shoes because they keep me balanced during my swing without my feet slipping. I've been hitting it solid almost every time, love the cleats.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie G.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fit is perfect. For what I paid, they're very good shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffry Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Great Game Improvement Tool...Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great Looks, Comfort , and Function. Can't ask for anything more. Been using spikeless shoes for a while, and didn't realize how much more grip and stability you get with spiked shoes. Glad I bought them.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Wynn

customer_reviews.title: These are very comfortable. Never got any blisters
customer_reviews.text: These are very comfortable. Never got any blisters. I play early in the morning when it's often very dewy. They have done a good job keeping my feet dry so far.
customer_reviews.author: Kent Walrath

customer_reviews.title: I like them a lot
customer_reviews.text: I like them a lot. First pair in a long time. Fits good I wear a 13. Wish they weren't so pointy at the toe but fit well. I like them.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking shoes. I went with a half size larger because of the pointed toe, they fit well.
customer_reviews.author: James Arndt

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Fit well and feel go when I golf! Gave me more stability on my swing!
customer_reviews.author: Howard J. Kisor Jr.

customer_reviews.title: I have super narrow feet
customer_reviews.text: I have super narrow feet, so I'd expect a normal person have a super fit. Great shoes, waterproof held up in bad conditions.
customer_reviews.author: Nick B.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Quality golf shoes for dirt cheap. Came fast, no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sharp looking and very comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Just arrived today and they look even better in person. Very comfortable. Will be trying on the course in the next week. Seem to be very well made and a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: Chase Tomlinson

customer_reviews.title: Good fit and firm in the heal.
customer_reviews.text: Puma fits me well so I'll continue to add styles. The Ace is very supportive in the heal where I have some reoccurring soreness.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: i know its a personal thing, i have other ...
customer_reviews.text: i know its a personal thing, i have other Puma shoes and they are ok, these are quite if possible i will be returning them
customer_reviews.author: L R-H

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this shoe, received it fast and it looks and feels great.
customer_reviews.author: Edward C.

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe first time I put them on to play ...
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe first time I put them on to play golf walked 5 mile course my feet thanked me Awsome
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: No problems got my new puma golf shoes in two days.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: No issues so far. Have used them around ten times so far. There is a major swing difference when you go from running shoes to actual golf shoes so make sure you hit the range prior to course.
customer_reviews.author: brewerfamily

customer_reviews.title: Not so much that I can't wear them comfortably. 1st pair of golf shoes
customer_reviews.text: I know PUMA shoes are a bit small, so I ordered a 1/2 size larger, and it was probably a bit too much. Not so much that I can't wear them comfortably. 1st pair of golf shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Coglon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe. Ran slightly small. Ordered a half size up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just be aware. That not everything is what it seems
customer_reviews.text: Just seem like the product was nicer in picture but once I saw it. It wasn't what I hoped for. The quality of the shoe seems poor..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my son who started golfing this year. Size 14 feet, he likes them, but he has never had any others. He doesn't complain, and he would if they weren't comfortable. They look exactly like my other son's tennis shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Nonni to 4

product_meta.title: PUMA Men's Golf Ace Golf Shoe
product_meta.description:
Full-grain leather quality and performance with amazing comfort and timeless design.

PUMA is the global athletic brand that successfully fuses influences from sport, lifestyle and fashion. PUMA's unique industry perspective delivers the unexpected in sport-lifestyle footwear, apparel and accessories, through technical innovation and revolutionary design.
feature_bullets: PWRCOOL powered by Outlast regulates temperature and increases comfort
